channel.title: ** [508] RuneHub [508] **
channel.description:
[b]Base:[/b] Summon-Pkz 508 [b]Goal:[/b] To establish a fun, noob-friendly old-ish 508 server
If anyone remembers pl0xagescape508, that was a really fun server mainly because 508's came out just about 1-2 months before pl0xagescape came out and everyone was like "ooo new graphics rsps!", plus that was the first 508 I've ever played on :P I'm going to be trying to make something like it, and it probably won't be as popular because 508's are pretty boring to play on now.
Because most 508's are boring, There will be no training unless you really want to train, and the commands are/will be
::tanker ::pure ::pray (for 99 pray) ::item I won't list teleports in this list. I also won't list any admin or non-important commands, like ::gfx
I want people to go straight to pking, instead of training for days and then finally pking. I've made this mistake a few times because training was boring and was considered "grinding".
You also won't lose any items, because it would get very irritating to keep typing ::item. But trading will exist, just if someone is too lazy to spawn any items, or needs a certain item but doesn't know the ID.
Note: I might change the ::item command and start an economy after the server is near done.
Pictures/Videos:
Having fun with dharoks: [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/1z64lj4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/msp4jr.jpg[/img]
A nice k0 with rune cbow tanking: [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/2n809jm.jpg[/img]
[size=15pt][b]All of primas gif's are listed below:[/b][/size] [img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Dbowspec-1.gif[/img]
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Msbspec.gif[/img]
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/SSspec.gif[/img]
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Dmacespec-1.gif[/img]
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Knives.gif[/img]
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Barrage.gif[/img]
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Blitz.gif[/img]
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Summon-1.gif[/img]
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Attackfollowing.gif[/img]
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/GMaul.gif[/img]
I hope you like it and support it :)

@pk3r_john wrote:

Base: Summon-Pkz 508
Goal: To establish a fun, noob-friendly old-ish 508 server

If anyone remembers pl0xagescape508, that was a really fun server mainly because 508’s came out just about 1-2 months before pl0xagescape came out and everyone was like “ooo new graphics rsps!”, plus that was the first 508 I’ve ever played on
I’m going to be trying to make something like it, and it probably won’t be as popular because 508’s are pretty boring to play on now.

Because most 508’s are boring, There will be no training unless you really want to train, and the commands are/will be

::tanker
::pure

::item
I won’t list teleports in this list.
I also won’t list any admin or non-important commands, like ::gfx

I want people to go straight to pking, instead of training for days and then finally pking. I’ve made this mistake a few times because training was boring and was considered “grinding”.

You also won’t lose any items, because it would get very irritating to keep typing ::item. But trading will exist, just if someone is too lazy to spawn any items, or needs a certain item but doesn’t know the ID.

Note: I might change the ::item command and start an economy after the server is near done.
